snippet.title: Dead by Daylight | Silent Hill | Art & Design Behind the Scenes
snippet.description:
Get an inside look at the creative process of bringing Silent Hill to Dead by Daylight with a new Behind the Scenes. Creative Director Dave Richard and Art Director Filip Ivanović reflect on the creation of the new Chapter and provide insight into the process of adapting the world of Silent Hill to the Realm of The Entity. 

AVAILABLE NOW 
Learn more about the Silent Hill Chapter: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/chapters/silent-hill 

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a brutal Killer and the other four play as Survivors. As a Killer, your goal is to sacrifice as many Survivors as possible. As a Survivor, your goal is to escape and avoid being caught and killed.  

BUY NOW: https://deadbydaylight.com/ 

Join the official forum: https://forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/  

Like and follow us on our official Social Media Channels:  
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeadByDaylight/  
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/deadbybhvr  
- Instagram: https://instagram.com/deadbydaylight 

#deadbydaylight #dbd #SilentHill
